issue.title: Accelerometer and gyro data should be in torso's local frame

content.raw:
Also, the [accelerometer](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Accelerometer) should report "proper acceleration", rather than the "coordinate acceleration".

This is the same as Gazebo's IMU sensor reports, for example, where the contribution of gravity is [added](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/d34567662a975917134399a9e72e87f52e9b2a0a/gazebo/sensors/ImuSensor.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#ImuSensor.cc-331).

It would be nice to also write tests with the proper expectations.
